      • setAutoRefreshEnabled

        public void setAutoRefreshEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets refresh interval on/off.
        Specified by:
        setAutoRefreshEnabled in interface AdBoostBannerImpl
        Parameters:
        enabled - if false, will set to off. If true, will set to the minimum defined by InMobi. We recommended calling setRefreshInterval(int) instead of calling this method with true.
        See Also:
        AdBoostBannerImpl.setRefreshInterval(int)
